bestFeeTierForSwap(address).notice: This method isn't a view because the Uniswap quoter doesn't support view quotes. Therefore, we highly recommend that this method is not called on-chain. This method will return 0 if the pair should not be swapped, and max(uint24) if there is no need to go to Uniswap

getPairsToSwap().notice: This method isn't a view and it is extremelly expensive and inefficient. DO NOT call this method on-chain, it is for off-chain purposes only.

swapPairs((address,uint24)[]).notice: Takes an array of swaps, and executes as many as possible, returning the amount that was swapped
